bgu.dcr.az.api.exen.mdef

Interface MessageDelayer


  • public interface MessageDelayer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addDelay(Message m, int from, int to)
      add delay to the given message the message is sent between agent 'from' to agent 'to'
      long extractTime(Message m)
      extract the time from the given message most of the time all the "timing" information will be stored inside the message metadata.
      long getInitialTime() 
      void initialize(Execution ex)
      initialize the delayer - this method will get called on each new execution that is started the delayer is reused between executions and this method will get called to notify it to reinitialize itself on the new execution

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize(Execution ex)
        initialize the delayer - this method will get called on each new execution that is started the delayer is reused between executions and this method will get called to notify it to reinitialize itself on the new execution
        Parameters:
        ex -

      • getInitialTime

        long getInitialTime()
        Returns:
        the initial time the mailer will take this time in order to initialize itself
